title: Ex-president accused of murder plot expelled from Togo to Burkina Faso

content: Kaja Kallas, the EU's foreign policy chief, said the bloc has "no interest to pick a fight, but we will hold our ground".

content: Two goalless fixtures at the weekend mean this season's Premier League has already featured more 0-0 draws than the whole of last term – but does that mean the league has been boring?
